snippet: David Baas, the Giants' starting center, spent six seasons in San Francisco and had to switch coasts before ending up on a winning team.
abstract: David Baas, the Giants' starting center, spent six seasons in San Francisco and had to switch coasts before ending up on a winning team.
lead_paragraph: Having spent the first six seasons of his career on the San Francisco 49ers, who were a combined 37-59, offensive lineman David Baas did not have a lot of experience winning games in the N.F.L.
